titles.title: Designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/12/1995--Introduced. Elects Representative Frank Mascara to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure and Representative Tim Holden to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
